I hate elevators.. I hate vans.. I hate small towns..

what i liked: -well the shooting and the atmosphere are very well done
-infinite shoves on singleplayer
what i didn't liked: -the tank having a boost on his movement speed when on fire
-common infected hitting you even if you are on a table and they can't reach you directly
-the special infected being very annoying to play against
-blood harvest finale on Expert
-autoahotgun having a bigger reloading animation if you empty ed all 10 shells
-it seems you need to be more close and precise to pick items up
Also is it just me or on singleplayer, it spawns more zombies? Not really complaining since infinite shoves help alot
